--- select_union_chain.sql
(select 1) union all (select 2) union all (select 3)

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.CompoundQuery{
    Op: "UNION",
    Queries: []ast.QueryExpr{
      &ast.SubQuery{
        Rparen: 9,
        Query: &ast.Select{
          Select: 1,
          Results: []ast.SelectItem{
            &ast.ExprSelectItem{
              Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
                ValuePos: 8,
                ValueEnd: 9,
                Base: 10,
                Value: "1",
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.SubQuery{
        Lparen: 21,
        Rparen: 30,
        Query: &ast.Select{
          Select: 22,
          Results: []ast.SelectItem{
            &ast.ExprSelectItem{
              Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
                ValuePos: 29,
                ValueEnd: 30,
                Base: 10,
                Value: "2",
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.SubQuery{
        Lparen: 42,
        Rparen: 51,
        Query: &ast.Select{
          Select: 43,
          Results: []ast.SelectItem{
            &ast.ExprSelectItem{
              Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
                ValuePos: 50,
                ValueEnd: 51,
                Base: 10,
                Value: "3",
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
(SELECT 1) UNION ALL (SELECT 2) UNION ALL (SELECT 3)
